title: Charming Costa Rica Coastal Mansion Steps from Beachfront with Rooftop Terrace, Pool & Restaurants
description: Become immersed in quintessential old-world Costa Rican luxury with a stay in the marvellous Santarena Hotel. Nestled in the vibrant Las Catalinas, this architectural masterpiece stands as a loving homage to the free-spirited and classically beautiful old mansions of Havana and Cartegena. Steps away, discover the pristine Playa Danta, or discover gastronomic joie de vivre at Ponciana. Explore the nearby tropical forest trails, and return to unwind in the rooftop terrace pool.
